From: Anshuman Purohit [mailto:anshumanpurohit@gmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, January 18, 2012 8:24 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Call Follow Up
Thanks Sara!
On Jan 18, 2012, at 4:32 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com> wrote: Hi Anshuman,
Thanks so much for letting me know, I really appreciate the feedback and will pass it along. The 5% does cover more than just invoicing and billing (for example, professional insurances, tax administration, expense deduction management, contract negotiations, etc.) but I understand that you have already done a lot of the leg work on getting your own company set up and you dont really have a need for these services at this time.
Please keep us in mind if anything changes and good luck on your project!
Take care, Sara
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6028 f: 703.793.6068 e: sconde@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

From: Anshuman Purohit [mailto:anshumanpurohit@gmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, January 18, 2012 2:36 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Call Follow Up
Thanks Sara for all the information and this follow up. My client is not interested in splitting the cost and 5% is way too much for me just to have the timesheet/invoicing done through MBO.
If things change, I'll get in touch with you again.
Thanks, Anshuman On Wed, Jan 18, 2012 at 10:48 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com> wrote: Hi Anshuman,
Hope you are doing well. I just wanted to follow up on our call, are you planning on using MBO Partners? Please let me know if you have any additional questions for me.
Thank you, Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
